fields.summary: JSON License is included in the transitive dependency of aliyun-sdk-oss 3.0.0

comments.body: I found this issue while working on HADOOP-15958.

We need to upgrade aliyun-java-sdk-core version to 4.0.0 or upper.
https://github.com/aliyun/aliyun-openapi-java-sdk/commit/8240a4c89229e62db173bd8b32789de78667b2d4

The latest version of aliyun-sdk-oss is 3.3.0 and it uses aliyun-java-sdk-core 3.4.0, so we need to upgrade the dependency manually.
Note: Raised the issue to upgrade the dependency in aliyun-sdk-oss: https://github.com/aliyun/aliyun-oss-java-sdk/issues/178

[~ajisakaa] is this a blocker for 3.2.0. I am planning to cut RC1 tomorrow. Is this possible to be fixed sooner?

If not a blocker, could this be moved.

This is a blocker.

Sooner fix: Revert HADOOP-15759 and all the related JIRAs.
Hi [~Sammi] and [~wujinhu], what do you think?
[~ajisakaa] [~Sammi] [~wujinhu] could we revert HADOOP-15759 to unblock 3.2.0 release. Thanks.
Reverting HADOOP-15759 and HADOOP-15671 seems fine. Thanks.

Hi [~ajisakaa],

Thank you. will u have some cycles to update same? I can help to commit.
Provided a patch for reverting the two commits.

[~ajisakaa] do we need to put this to any other branches?

Hi [~ajisakaa]

Latest patch is not applying on to trunk. Could u pls help. Thanks

Hi [~ajisakaa] 

Attaching a new revert from top of trunk after fixing the conflict. 

Could you please help to review and commit. Thanks

+1, thanks.

bq. do we need to put this to any other branches?
Yes.
Committed this to trunk, branch-3.2, branch-3.2.0, branch-3.1, branch-3.0, branch-2, and branch-2.9. Thank you, [~sunilg]!
